body.name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Z Flip 4 Factory Unlocked SM-F721U1 128GB Bora Purple (Renewed)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: FLEX, POSE, POST: Getting that post-worthy solo shot is easy with a phone that stands on its own; Put Galaxy Z Flip4 in Flex Mode and capture hands-free selfies, record your epic dance moves and never worry about your makeshift tripod falling over again
CAPTURE ON ONE SCREEN, TEXT ON THE OTHER: Catch up with friends on the top and find the perfect pic to post on the bottom; Flex Mode makes doing two things at once a breeze

NEVER MISS A NOTIFICATION: The customizable cover screen on Galaxy Z Flip4 allows you to see just what you need while keeping your full screen private; Respond to texts, skip songs and change settings all while keeping your cellphone conveniently compact

PERFECTLY POCKET SIZED: Ditch the bag and travel light; The compact, foldable design lets you say bye to the bulk without sacrificing a big screen; Slide your smart phone easily into even your front pocket

UNFOLD A FASHION STATEMENT: Your phone is your most-used accessory, so why not make it an extension of your style, Choose from a wide array of colors and customize your cover screen so your mobile fits your vibe
body.description: FLEX, POSE, POST: Getting that post-worthy solo shot is easy with a phone that stands on its own; Put Galaxy Z Flip4 in Flex Mode and capture hands-free selfies, record your epic dance moves and never worry about your makeshift tripod falling over again.Form_factor : Fl Our carefully inspected and tested Manufacturer refurbished products assure full functionality, having undergone a comprehensive examination. While they may exhibit signs of light to moderate usage, each unit is certified as functional by Phonecheck, an industry-certified, leading stringent quality control and diagnostics examination. Moreover, our commitment to quality extends to a thorough cleaning process. Please note that each shipment may arrive in a brown or white generic box, accompanied by relevant charging accessories (please be aware that headphones are not included), which may also be generic. Our top priority throughout this refurbishment process is your reliable performance and quality assurance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brand new. Love it!
reviews.reviewText: I waited a week to leave my review so here goes. Phone came packaged well. Looks brand new. No scratches on either screen. Battery life is good. Phone is super fast connected to my wifi. I am VERY pleased with my purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this phone so far. I've been an Apple girly for a really long time and decided it was time for a change. I have wanted this phone forever. I was nervous due to the reviews of if it would work or even come undamaged. So far I haven't had any issues with it. It came with no scratches or anything that suggested that it had been used prior to me getting it. The screen is working great (knock on wood). It's so cute and I love the amount of customizations you can make with it. If you're thinking about it, go for this deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Phone not unlocked
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of the flip 4 and only to find one of them is not unlocked so I have to call all network providers to see if it was in anyway connected to one of them or pay to get it unlocked. I am disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The phone seems as good as new. There are nearly no scratches the only one is the here you try to put your charger in and you miss but that’s nothing because I will be making those anyway. Flex mode works, outside screen works, phone moves fast, all that’s left is to see how it charges and the battery life span. If that sucks I luckily have a 2 year warranty. This is random but the SIM card key came broken. Update it charges. In a year I will come back and give this that final star

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excelente equipo y en buenas condiciones
reviews.reviewText: El equipo está como nuevo, sin rajaduras ni nada que se note desgasteVino con cargador como nuevo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great phone. Looks like new. Came 1 day early. I'm enjoying it

reviews.reviewerName: Good phone, in excellent condition as they had promised..i am happy
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received this phone as they have promised me..i am so happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars I love it! But not sure if it came with a screen protector
reviews.reviewText: So I ordered another EXCELLENT CONDITION flip4 from Bayshine, the 256GB version this time, hoping it'd be flawless like the 128GB one I got back in December (ended up giving it to my mother) but the one I got today, after a week, was in like "good enough condition" HUH? I was really hoping Bayshine would be consistent in it's excellent condition lines but I guess not because this one came with tiny but MANY scratches on the cover screen and VERY noticeable scratch/dent on the hinge and a slight popping/scratchy sound on the right side of the hinge where the sratches are so I will be returning and trying ElGeo fingers crossed-PREVIOUS REVIEW 128GB EXCELLENT CONDITION-(5/5 stars) First of all, shipping was SO QUICK took like 3 days to get to me and I've only had it for 3 days and I really really like it! Works great and came in truly excellent condition, but I'm not sure if it had a screen protector or not, no where in the description did it say it comes with one so I have place one on and was doing a bit of a closing and opening test and it all seems fine, gonna leave it open for a while just incase 😅
